original_title: Angelina Ballerina: Dance Around the World
overview: Angelina and her friends explore dances from near and far as they boogie, bop, skip and hop around the world in these exciting adventures. In step with a lively Irish Jig, the festive Chinese Dragon Dance, the smooth Cheddar Cheese Slide with a French flair, and more, the mouselings teach each other -- and themselves -- about the power of dance...and friendship.
title: Angelina Ballerina: Dance Around the World
